schema.title: Modbus TCP Source options
schema.description: An Astarte Flow source that produces data by polling a Modbus device.

host.description: The IP address of the Modbus device the source will connect to.
host.title: Modbus host

port.description: The port of the Modbus device the source will connect to. Defaults to 502, the standard Modbus TCP port
port.title: Modbus port

slave_id.description: The slave id of the Modbus device.
slave_id.title: Slave ID

targets.description: An array of targets to be polled by the source
targets.title: Targets

base_address.description: The Modbus address of the target.
base_address.title: Base address

name.description: The name of the target, that will be used as key in the resulting Flow message.
name.title: Name

modbus_type.description: The modbus type of the target.
modbus_type.title: Format

polling_interval_ms.description: The polling interval of the target, expressed in milliseconds.
polling_interval_ms.title: Polling

static_metadata.description: Static metadata that will be added as metadata in resulting Flow messages
static_metadata.title: Static metadata
